sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no mention of a maester or any character named Volarik. The only known maester bound to Casterly Rock is Creylen, who is serving House Lannister at the time of the books. It is unknown who the maester at Casterly Rock was twenty to thirty years ago, during Jaime and Tyrion's youth.
